t: r/Incense on Reddit: Hiiii can anyone please recommend a link to buy REAL Palo Santo sticks from Amazon? I got ones that have black smoke and heard that they are sprayed with fragrance!
s: July 28, 2022 - I just went and checked with my Palo Santo. (I normaly don't use it that way so I didn't know) No sooty flame, nore black smoke so whoever told you this might be onto something. However, I wouldn't buy Palo at Amozon. But maybe someone actually knows a shop that also sells via Amazon.

Amazon.com: Palo Santo 1 LB Bag (75 Sticks Approx - 4+inches Long) : Home & Kitchen
s: Smells more like plain wood smoke than good Palo Santo. Bought it because it was the cheapest bulk pricing. Definitely a case of caveat emptor here, but they can be repurposed as drawer fresheners for clothes instead of dryer sheets. Maybe they will develop more smell over time. Perhaps I got too fresh of a batch. I will try another brand ...
